page.title: 20SCHOOLS AROUND BYFIELD
page.content: BODDINGTON SCHOOL AIMS TO GIVE EACH CHILD ACCORDING TO HIS ABILITY A FULL GROUNDING IN THE BASIC SUBJECTS AND OPPORTUNITIES FOR FIRST HAND EXPERIENCE OF UNDERSTANDING SOMETHING OF THEIR WORLD.IN BYFIELD SCHOOL MATHS IS THE MOST POPULAR SUBJECT.BUSINESS NEEDS WAS A SUGGESTION FOR A NEW SUBJECT.THIS WOULD BE IMPORTANT IN LATER LIFE AS WOULD SOCIAL SKILLS.BYFIELD SCHOOL HAS GOT 127 PUPILS.THE PUPILS ARE SPLIT UP INTO 4 CLASSES.THE SMALL BODDINGTON PRIMARY SCHOOL I9S A CHURCH OF ENGLAND VOLUNTARY CONTROLLED SCHOOL.BOTH SCHOOLS CATER FOR CHILDREN FROM 4 TO 11 YEARS OF AGE.THE CHILDREN ARE ORGANISED ACCORDING TO AGE INTO 3 CLASSES IN BODDINGTON SCHOOL.
